text.value: Farmer: Here young traveler. I come from north seeking for help. There are a few warriors plundering my town. Would you help me?
Go to the town and surroundings and kill up to 5 enemies. Gold: 100.
Thanks! You can build a barrack(use b key) now!
Hi Leader, we have detected some hostil soldiers... We need to do something with the nearby enemy camps before they dare to attack us!
